thread.title: Badrinath ki Dulhania movie review: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan’s romcom sends strong, empowering message
thread.title_full: Badrinath ki Dulhania movie review: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan’s romcom sends strong, empowering message

author: FE Online
title: Badrinath ki Dulhania movie review: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan’s romcom sends strong, empowering message
text:
Badrinath ki Dulhania movie review: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan’s romcom sends strong, empowering message Badrinath ki Dulhania movie review: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan’s romcom sends strong, empowering message The Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania duo is back to share the silver screen with their latest release Badrinath ki Dulhania. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 10, 2017 11:19 AM The makers of Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania presents Badrinath Ki Dulhania. 
The Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania duo is back to share the silver screen with their latest release Badrinath ki Dulhania. Directed by Shashank Khaitan, this Karan Johar romcom film starring Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan in the lead roles, also features Sahil Vaid, Aakanksha Singh, Gauahar Khan, Shweta Basu Prasad. While Alia Bhatt plays the character of determined, ambitious girl Vaidehi who wants much more than just a pretty lehenga, she demands respect, wants a career and wants to be seen as equal by her male counterparts. On the other hand, Varun Dhawan is playing the character of Badrinath aka Badri, who wants make Vaidehi fall in love with him and works his charm along with the help of friends and family manages to bring her to the altar. 
You may also want to watch- 
The movie is nothing like Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania where Alia Bhatt just wanted a pretty designer lehenga on her wedding day. Unlike its title, Badrinath ki Dulhania talks about the world beyond marriage in an Indian society. Set up in a small town of Uttar Pradesh, the film tells what happens when two individuals that are totally opposite go against each other. The movie sends a very strong message in an interesting way. 
You may also want to watch- 
The pair of Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan is refreshing as ever, while their chemistry on screen is sparkling, their characters are entertaining. Songs like Tamma Tamma Again and title track Badri Ki Dulhania gives the movie an extra edge and makes the movie refreshing for the audience. This Karan Johar production is colourful, enjoyable, romantic and also delivers an important message.
